channel.title: MoparClassic Pk Testing
channel.description:
Looking to test some formulas related to pking.. and need a group of players to make a mini event happen. Hopefully players who can tell the difference in the formula and supply feedback.. if not you can still join the fun. Items can be spawned but stats will have to be quickly trained. The exp rate will be changed to make it happen. Also for that limited time if you want to wine a character ill remove the dummy level 8 limit.
If you have a formula you would like to test go ahead and let me know and I will implement it.
Also would like to make this event happen for the alpha crew doing great work reporting bugs. :) Time for a little bit of fun?
Here is a countdown :
[img]http://countdownimages.org/cdwn/0_3qf_666666.png[/img]
Every time you refresh this page it will be updated
Edit : [b]You need to join irc during this event and to play the server anyways [/b]

item.title: MoparClassic Pk Testing
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

nacional:

no setable stats , will mean having to make several characters kinda lame. but good idea, i’ll try to be there.

There might and hopefully will be a set stat command if not exp rate will be fluctuated and training will be quick and easy.

This thread will also be used for discussion of the combat formula.
Going to pull up old calcs we have here at mopar…

[code]/*

  • @Class: RSCDSimulator
  • @Author: Arrin
  • @Date: 19-Sep-2009
    */

import java.util.;
import java.io.;

class RSCDSimulator {

    /*
     *        Combat levels/armour stats
     */                
    static double[] hitpoints = {99, 99}; // hits #1, #2
    static int[] strength = {99, 99}; // strength level #1, #2
    static int[] attack = {99, 99}; // attack level #1, #2
    static int[] weaponAim = {82, 82}; // weapon aim #1, #2
    static int[] power = {82, 82}; // weapon power #1, #2
    static int[] def = {99, 99}; // defense level #1, #2
    static int[] armour = {126, 156}; // Armour points #1, #2
    static Random r = new Random();
   
    public static void main(String args[]) {
           
   
    System.out.println("Welcome to RSCD Combat Simulator.\n");
           
    /*
     *        Gives us each players combat and max hit
     *        This makes it easyer to test what is fair
     */
           
    System.out.print("Player #1's combat: " + getcombat()+ " + max hit: "+ maxHit(strength[0], power[0], 0)+ " hitpoints:" + hitpoints[0] + "\n");
    System.out.print("Player #2's combat: " + getcombat1()+ " + max hit: "+ maxHit(strength[1], power[1], 0)+" hitpoints:" + hitpoints[1] +"\n\n");
                           ;
           
    /*
     *        Starts the simulator untill 1 player hits 0 hp
     */
           
    while(hitpoints[0] > 0 &&
                                    hitpoints[1] > 0) {
                                            double damage;
                                            damage = calcHits(0, 1);
                                            applyDamage(damage, 1);
                                            System.out.print("Player #1 hits: "+ damage +"\n");
                                            System.out.print("Player #1s hp: " + hitpoints[0] +"\n\n");
                   
                                            double damage1;
                                            damage1 = calcHits(1, 0);
                                            applyDamage(damage1, 0);
                                            System.out.print("Player #2 hits: " + damage1 + "\n");
                                            System.out.print("Player #2s hp: " + hitpoints[1] +"\n\n");
           
                    try {
                            if(hitpoints[1] < 0) {
                                            BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("RSCD Fights.java", true));
                                            out.write('\n');  
                                            out.write("Player #1 was the winner");
                                            out.write('\n');
                                            out.close();
                                    }
                            } catch (Exception e) {
                            System.out.print(e);
                    }
                    try {
                            if(hitpoints[0] < 0) {
                                            BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("RSCD Fights.java", true));
                                            out.write('\n');  
                                            out.write("Player #2 was the winner");
                                            out.write('\n');
                                            out.close();
                                    }
                            } catch (Exception e) {
                            System.out.print(e);
                    }
            }
    }
           
    /*
     * hits the player for however much damage is calculated
     */
           
    static void applyDamage(double damage, int player) {
            if (hitpoints[player] > 0) {
                    hitpoints[player] -= damage;
            }
    }
   
    /*
     * Works out combat levels based on stats
     */
   
    public static int getcombat() {
            return getCombatLevel(attack[0], def[0], strength[0], 99, 1, 1, 1);
    }
   
    public static int getcombat1() {
            return getCombatLevel(attack[1], def[1], strength[1], 99, 1, 1, 1);
    }
   
    /*
     * Formulae for working out levels
     */
     
    public static int getCombatLevel(int att, int def, int str, int hits, int magic, int pray, int range) {
            double attack = att + str;
            double defense = def + hits;
            double mage = pray + magic;
            mage /= 8D;
           
            if(attack < ((double)range * 1.5D)) {
                    return (int)((defense / 4D) + ((double)range * 0.375D) + mage);
            }
            else {
                    return (int)((attack / 4D) + (defense / 4D) + mage);
            }
    }
                   
    /*
     * Calculate the max hit possible with the given stats
     */
     
    public static int maxHit(int strength, int weaponPower, int bonus) {
            double newStrength = (double)(strength + bonus);
            return (int)(newStrength * (((double)weaponPower * 0.00175D) + 0.1D) + 1.05D);
    }
   
    /*
     * Calulates what you hit *Formulae has been tweaked for use here*
     * Formulae will need to be changed for use in a server
     *
     */
     
     
static double calcHits(int player, int player2) {
    double att = attack[player] + weaponAim[player] / 2.4D;
    double defe = def[player2] + armour[player2] / 5.7D;

    double hitChance = r.nextInt(30) + (att - defe);

    int maxProb = 5;
    int nearMaxProb = 10;
    int avProb = 80;
    int lowHit = 5;

    int shiftValue = (int)Math.round((def[player2]) * 0.05D);
    maxProb = shiftValue;
    nearMaxProb -= (int)Math.round(shiftValue*1.5);
    avProb -= (int)Math.round(shiftValue*2.0);
    lowHit += (int)Math.round(shiftValue*3.5);

    int hitRange = r.nextInt(100);

    int max = maxHit(strength[player], power[player], 1);

    if(hitChance>=(100-nearMaxProb)) {
        return Math.abs((max-(max*(r.nextInt(15)*0.03D))));
    }
    else if(hitChance>=(100-avProb)) {
        int newMax = (int)Math.round((max-(max*0.1D)));
        return Math.abs((newMax-(max*(r.nextInt(85)*0.01D))));
    }
    else if(hitChance >= 0) {
        int newMax = (int)Math.round((max - (max * 0.1D)));
        return Math.abs((newMax - (max * (r.nextInt(85) * 0.01D))));
    }
    else {
            return 0;
        }
    }
}[/code]

Objects Calc

/**
 * Add Potion and Prayer multipliers to Attack-, Defence- and Strength-levels like this:
 * private static final int YOUR_ATTACK_LEVEL = 99 + (99 * 0.2D) + (99 * 0.1D);
 */
public final class Combat {
     private static final int YOUR_ATTACK_LEVEL = 99;
     private static final int YOUR_DEFENCE_LEVEL = 99;
     private static final int YOUR_STRENGTH_LEVEL = 99;
     private static final int YOUR_HITS_LEVEL = 99;
     private static final int YOUR_AIM = 81;
     private static final int YOUR_ARMOUR = 200;
     private static final int YOUR_POWER = 81;
     private static final int YOUR_OPPONENTS_ATTACK_LEVEL = 99;
     private static final int YOUR_OPPONENTS_DEFENCE_LEVEL = 99;
     private static final int YOUR_OPPONENTS_STRENGTH_LEVEL = 99;
     private static final int YOUR_OPPONENTS_HITS_LEVEL = 99;
     private static final int YOUR_OPPONENTS_AIM = 81;
     private static final int YOUR_OPPONENTS_ARMOUR = 200;
     private static final int YOUR_OPPONENTS_POWER = 81;
     private static final int[] FIGHT_MODES = {1, 3, 0, 0};
     private int yourHits = YOUR_HITS_LEVEL;
     private int yourOpponentsHits = YOUR_OPPONENTS_HITS_LEVEL;
     
     private Combat() {
         
     }
     
     private void simulate() {
          while(yourHits > 0 && yourOpponentsHits > 0) {
               System.out.println("You hit " + getYourNextHit() + " on your opponent! Your opponent now has " + yourOpponentsHits + " Hits left.");
               if(yourOpponentsHits <= 0) {
                    break;
               }
               System.out.println("Your opponent hits " + getYourOpponentsNextHit() + " on you! You now have " + yourHits + " Hits left.");
          }
     }
     
     private int getYourNextHit() {
          return yourOpponentsHits - (yourOpponentsHits -= getNextHit(YOUR_STRENGTH_LEVEL, YOUR_POWER, YOUR_ATTACK_LEVEL, YOUR_AIM, YOUR_OPPONENTS_DEFENCE_LEVEL, YOUR_OPPONENTS_ARMOUR));
     }
     
     private int getYourOpponentsNextHit() {
          return yourHits - (yourHits -= getNextHit(YOUR_OPPONENTS_STRENGTH_LEVEL, YOUR_OPPONENTS_POWER, YOUR_OPPONENTS_ATTACK_LEVEL, YOUR_OPPONENTS_AIM, YOUR_DEFENCE_LEVEL, YOUR_ARMOUR));
     }
     
     private int getNextHit(int strength, int power, int attack, int aim, int defence, int armour) {
          return isNextHitValid(attack, aim, defence, armour) ? (int)(Math.random() * getMaxHit(strength, power)) : 0;
     }
     
     private int getMaxHit(int strength, int power) {
          return (int)Math.ceil(((strength) + FIGHT_MODES[0]) * ((power * 0.00175) + 0.1) + 1.05);
     }
     
     private boolean isNextHitValid(int attack, int aim, int defence, int armour) {
          return (Math.random() * 100D) <= (attack + aim) / ((attack + aim + defence + armour) / 100D);
     }
     
     public static void main(String[] args) {
          new Combat().simulate();
     }
}

Current situation :

	/**
	 * Calulates what one mob should hit on another with meelee
	 */
	public static int calcFightHit(Mob attacker, Mob defender) {
		int max = maxHit(attacker.getStrength(),
				attacker.getWeaponPowerPoints(), attacker.isPrayerActivated(1),
				attacker.isPrayerActivated(4), attacker.isPrayerActivated(10),
				styleBonus(attacker, 2));
		int newAtt = (int) (addPrayers(attacker.isPrayerActivated(2),
				attacker.isPrayerActivated(5), attacker.isPrayerActivated(11))
				* (attacker.getAttack() / 0.8D)
				+ ((DataConversions.random(0, 4) == 0 ? attacker
						.getWeaponPowerPoints() : attacker.getWeaponAimPoints()) / 2.5D)
				+ (attacker.getCombatStyle() == 1
						&& DataConversions.random(0, 2) == 0 ? 4 : 0)
				+ (DataConversions.random(0, 100) <= 10 ? (attacker
						.getStrength() / 5D) : 0) + (styleBonus(attacker, 0) * 2));
		int newDef = (int) (addPrayers(defender.isPrayerActivated(0),
				defender.isPrayerActivated(3), defender.isPrayerActivated(9))
				* ((DataConversions.random(0, 100) <= 5 ? 0 : defender
						.getDefense()) * 1.1D)
				+ ((DataConversions.random(0, 100) <= 5 ? 0 : defender
						.getArmourPoints()) / 2.75D)
				+ (defender.getStrength() / 4D) + (styleBonus(defender, 1) * 2));

		int hitChance = DataConversions.random(0, 100) + (newAtt - newDef);
		if (attacker instanceof Npc) {
			hitChance -= 5;
		}
		if (DataConversions.random(0, 100) <= 10) {
			hitChance += 20;
		}
		if (hitChance > (defender instanceof Npc ? 40 : 50)) {
			int maxProb = 5; // 5%
			int nearMaxProb = 7; // 7%
			int avProb = 73; // 73%
			int lowHit = 10; // 15%

			// Probablities are shifted up/down based on armour
			int shiftValue = (int) Math
					.round(defender.getArmourPoints() * 0.02D);
			maxProb -= shiftValue;
			nearMaxProb -= (int) Math.round(shiftValue * 1.5);
			avProb -= (int) Math.round(shiftValue * 2.0);
			lowHit += (int) Math.round(shiftValue * 3.5);

			int hitRange = DataConversions.random(0, 100);

			if (hitRange >= (100 - maxProb)) {
				return max;
			} else if (hitRange >= (100 - nearMaxProb)) {
				return DataConversions
						.roundUp(Math.abs((max - (max * (DataConversions
								.random(0, 10) * 0.01D)))));
			} else if (hitRange >= (100 - avProb)) {
				int newMax = (int) DataConversions
						.roundUp((max - (max * 0.1D)));
				return DataConversions
						.roundUp(Math.abs((newMax - (newMax * (DataConversions
								.random(0, 50) * 0.01D)))));
			} else {
				int newMax = (int) DataConversions
						.roundUp((max - (max * 0.5D)));
				return DataConversions
						.roundUp(Math.abs((newMax - (newMax * (DataConversions
								.random(0, 95) * 0.01D)))));
			}
		}
		return 0;
	}
